thread.title: JoAnn Rahe
thread.title_full: Culinary Depot reviewed by JoAnn Rahe

author: JoAnn Rahe
title: JoAnn Rahe
text: We had purchase so items and they arrive on time. As we were taking them out of the box we noticed that two of the items were defective. I called the customer service department and they asked me to email them pictures of the defective product, I did and they promptly emailed and called me that they were sending replacements to me in the mail at no charge and to just throw the defective items away. Three days later I had the replacements. Great Job.
